description: You'll love this super tasty chicken pasta recipe that's ready to eat in 20 minutes. Made with chicken, olives and basil, this is a standout pasta dish.
name: Easy Chilli & Garlic Chicken Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths COOK Chilli, Garlic & Rosemary Chicken Breast Steaks
340g La Molisana Pomodoro Extra Di Lusso Sugo Al Basilico

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain and return to pan.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken for 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a board and thickly slice.
Add pasta sauce and olives to pan over medium heat and bring to a simmer. Add chicken and pasta, then toss to combine.
Top with basil and parmesan. Serve seasoned with pepper.
